title: The Cook and the Book
teaser: Chefs and writers explore the language of food on the plate and on the page. We meet novelists who cook, chefs who write, and a poet of pies.  It's an hour of deliciousness in words and food. Writing Restaurants with Michelle Wildgen; Sweetness #9 with Stephan Eirik Clark; Pie Poetry with Kate Lebo; The Novelist and the Cook - Alice Waters and Michelle Wildgen; Thug Kitchen and the Politics of Food Writing; Dangerous Idea: Capitalism Creates Psychopaths; On Our Minds:  Computers are Making Us Smarter!  (Really).
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 MPX. To see more, visit .
